Key: Hey Kurumi, you here?

She's not. I thought I'd find her here, but
I guess she's preoccupied.
I wonder what she's up to.

Oh, well. I'll give up for today. I have to hit
the market for dinner anyway.
Phew. I think I bought too much. Hm?
Well, time for me to start prep for dinner.
Is that... Kurumi? What is she doing over there?
Hm. She looks pretty sad. Should I... say hi?

What if she's thinking about something
dangerous...? Should I keep an eye on her?
Huh...?
Shin, can you hear me?
Reine-san? Yes I can.
I sensed Kurumi in your vicinity.
Yeah, I was just about to approach her.
You see, there's something I'm worried about.\nKurumi seems unstable at the moment.
Don't tell me... she's about to go berserk.
No. Rather, she seems weakened. As if she\nis enduring something.
Weak...? We're talking about Kurumi?

Hehe. Shido-san, what are you doing over
there?
...! She's noticed me!
I'll leave the rest to you. Be sure not to upset\nher.
G-Got it, but...
Is something the matter?
Oh, uh... Nothing. What were you doing, Kurumi?

Were you staring at me this whole time? If
you noticed me, you should have said hi.
Well, you looked deep in thought, so...
I was looking at the sky, and the town.
Sky...? Town...?

Yes. The sky and the town during sunset.
The colors at a time like this are gorgeous.

I was staring at them, and it felt like I was
going to be swallowed whole.
Kurumi...
Shido-san...?
Oh, uh, um... Can I ask you something?
Huh? Sure, what is it?
Kurumi, are you...
Could you be... lonely?
Lonely? Why do you ask?

Y-Yeah. Well, um, you've seemed a bit
emotional.
Yeah. Just seemed like it.
You... may be right.

Yeah, I get it. Staring at the sunset gets me
feeling sentimental. Is it like that for you,
too?
I am not sure. Is that all you've got to say?
Oh. Uh, sorry.
No, it's fine. I'll be on my way, then.
Okay. Be careful.

Be careful, huh? Always so kind, Shido-san.
Thank you. Good-bye.
Because of her abnormal behavior, I tend to\nmiss it, but one might think in this moment\nthat Kurumi could be a normal girl.
Yeah. You might be right.
